birth_place.zh-cn: 元朝江浙等处行中书省台州路宁海县
birth_place.en: Ninghai County, Taizhou Lu, Jiangzhe Province, Yuan Dynasty

death_place.en: Yingtian Prefecture, South Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明朝建文年间重臣、文学家、思想家。因参与组织削藩及在靖难之变后拒绝与朱棣合作而遭处死。
description.en: A prominent scholar-official, writer, and thinker of the Jianwen era of the Ming Dynasty. He was executed for his involvement in the policy of reducing the power of imperial princes and for his refusal to cooperate with Zhu Di after the Jingnan campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，洪武帝朱元璋第四子，发动靖难之役从侄子建文帝手中夺取皇位。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, by launching the Jingnan campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，明太祖朱元璋之孙。其削藩政策引发了靖难之役，最终导致其失位。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming Dynasty, grandson of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang. His policy to reduce the power of imperial princes triggered the Jingnan campaign, which ultimately led to his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 明初大儒，被誉为“开国文臣之首”，方孝孺的老师。
description.en: A prominent Confucian scholar of the early Ming Dynasty, hailed as the 'head of the founding civil officials', and the teacher of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之父，洪武年间官员，因空印案受牵连被诛杀。
description.en: Father of Fang Xiaoru, an official during the Hongwu era who was implicated and executed in the Empty Seal Case.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武年间发生的政治事件，明太祖朱元璋因此案诛杀了大量官员。
description.en: A political incident during the Hongwu era of the Ming Dynasty, in which the Hongwu Emperor executed a large number of officials.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年的一场因削藩政策而引起的内战，由燕王朱棣对抗建文帝朱允炆，最终朱棣获胜并即位为帝。
description.en: A civil war in the early Ming Dynasty triggered by the policy to reduce the power of imperial princes. It was fought between Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, and the Jianwen Emperor Zhu Yunwen, resulting in Zhu Di's victory and ascension to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第十一子，封蜀王。因贤德闻名，曾聘请方孝孺为世子师。
description.en: The 11th son of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, enfeoffed as the Prince of Shu. Known for his virtue, he hired Fang Xiaoru as a tutor for his heir.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期旨在削弱各地藩王势力的国策，是靖难之役的直接导火索。
description.en: A national policy during the Jianwen era aimed at weakening the power of regional imperial princes, which served as the direct trigger for the Jingnan campaign.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的兵部尚书，与黄子澄一同主张削藩。
description.en: Minister of War during the Jianwen Emperor's reign, who, along with Huang Zicheng, advocated for the reduction of the princes' power.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的太常寺卿，与齐泰一同主张削藩。
description.en: Minister of the Court of Imperial Sacrifices during the Jianwen Emperor's reign, who, along with Qi Tai, advocated for the reduction of the princes' power.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，在靖难之役中打开南京金川门投降燕军，导致建文帝政权覆灭。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty general who surrendered to the Yan army by opening Nanjing's Jinchuan Gate during the Jingnan campaign, leading to the collapse of the Jianwen Emperor's regime.

description.zh-cn: 明朝水师将领，在靖难之役中率战舰投降燕军，使燕军得以顺利渡过长江。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty naval commander who surrendered his fleet to the Yan army during the Jingnan campaign, enabling them to cross the Yangtze River smoothly.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣的主要谋士，在靖难之役中功勋卓著。曾劝说朱棣不要杀害方孝孺。
description.en: A key advisor to the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di, who made significant contributions during the Jingnan campaign. He once advised Zhu Di not to execute Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之弟，与其兄一同被朱棣处死。
description.en: Younger brother of Fang Xiaoru, executed together with his brother by Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之兄。
description.en: Elder brother of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之子，在父亲被捕后自杀。
description.en: Son of Fang Xiaoru, who committed suicide after his father's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之子，在父亲被捕后自杀。
description.en: Son of Fang Xiaoru, who committed suicide after his father's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺之妻，在丈夫被捕后与二子一同自杀。
description.en: Wife of Fang Xiaoru, who committed suicide with her two sons after her husband's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子。他即位后赦免了建文朝诸臣的家属。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the eldest son of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di. After ascending the throne, he pardoned the families of the officials from the Jianwen court.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺的堂兄，在明仁宗朱高炽即位后获得赦免。
description.en: Cousin of Fang Xiaoru, who was pardoned after the Hongxi Emperor Zhu Gaochi ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 南明第一位皇帝，追赠方孝孺为太师，谥号“文正”。
description.en: The first emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty, who posthumously granted Fang Xiaoru the title of Grand Preceptor and the posthumous name 'Wenzheng'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武年间东阁大学士，曾举荐方孝孺。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the East Pavilion during the Hongwu era of the Ming Dynasty, who once recommended Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武年间东阁大学士，曾举荐方孝孺。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the East Pavilion during the Hongwu era of the Ming Dynasty, who once recommended Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 由朱元璋建立的中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的学术和行政机构，方孝孺曾在其中担任侍讲、学士等职。
description.en: An academic and administrative institution in ancient China where Fang Xiaoru served as a lecturer and academician.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺是方克勤的儿子。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru is the son of Fang Keqin.

description.zh-cn: 方孝闻是方孝孺的兄长。
description.en: Fang Xiaowen is the elder brother of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝友是方孝孺的弟弟。
description.en: Fang Xiaoyou is the younger brother of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方中宪是方孝孺的儿子。
description.en: Fang Zhongxian is the son of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方中愈是方孝孺的儿子。
description.en: Fang Zhongyu is the son of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 郑氏是方孝孺的配偶。
description.en: Zheng shi was the spouse of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝复是方孝孺的堂兄。
description.en: Fang Xiaofu was the cousin of Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺拜宋濂为师，完成学业。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru studied under Song Lian as his master to complete his education.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺出生于浙江宁海县。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru was born in Ninghai County, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 方克勤因受空印案牵连而被诛杀。
description.en: Fang Keqin was implicated and executed in the Empty Seal Case.

description.zh-cn: 与杨枢共同举荐方孝孺，使其在洪武十五年获明太祖召见。
description.en: Jointly with Yang Shu, recommended Fang Xiaoru, leading to him being summoned by the Hongwu Emperor in the 15th year of the Hongwu era (1382).

description.zh-cn: 与吴沉共同举荐方孝孺，使其在洪武十五年获明太祖召见。
description.en: Jointly with Wu Chen, recommended Fang Xiaoru, leading to him being summoned by the Hongwu Emperor in the 15th year of the Hongwu era (1382).

description.zh-cn: 洪武十五年，因吴沉、杨枢举荐，明太祖朱元璋召见了方孝孺。
description.en: In the 15th year of the Hongwu era (1382), upon the recommendation of Wu Chen and Yang Shu, the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang summoned and met with Fang Xiaoru.

description.zh-cn: 蜀王朱椿闻其贤能，聘请方孝孺为世子师，并亲题“正学”二字赠其书斋。
description.en: Zhu Chun, the Prince of Shu, heard of his talent and hired Fang Xiaoru as a tutor for his heir, personally inscribing the name 'Zhengxue' for his study.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝即位后，即召方孝孺入京委以重任，处理国家大事也会征求他的意见。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Jianwen Emperor summoned Fang Xiaoru to the capital and entrusted him with important responsibilities, also consulting him on major state affairs.

position.zh-cn: 翰林侍讲、翰林学士、文学博士
position.en: Hanlin Expositor-in-waiting, Hanlin Academician, Doctor of Letters

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺在建文朝担任要职，深受建文帝信任。
description.en: Fang Xiaoru held key positions in the Jianwen court and was deeply trusted by the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 方孝孺在建文朝先后出任翰林侍讲及翰林学士。
description.en: During the Jianwen era, Fang Xiaoru successively served as Expositor-in-waiting and Academician at the Hanlin Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役中，方孝孺为建文帝起草讨伐朱棣的诏书，并在城破后拒绝为其草拟即位诏书，最终被杀。
description.en: During the Jingnan campaign, Fang Xiaoru drafted edicts denouncing Zhu Di for the Jianwen Emperor, and after the capital fell, he refused to draft the accession edict for Zhu Di, which led to his execution.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役期间，为建文帝起草讨伐燕王朱棣的诏书檄文。
description.en: During the Jingnan campaign, he drafted imperial edicts and military proclamations against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, for the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 因方孝孺拒绝草拟即位诏书，朱棣下令将其在南京聚宝门外凌迟处死，并诛其“十族”。
description.en: Because Fang Xiaoru refused to draft the accession edict, Zhu Di ordered him to be executed by slow slicing outside Nanjing's Jubao Gate and had his 'ten kindreds' exterminated.

description.zh-cn: 与黄子澄共同向建文帝建议削藩，以加强中央集权。
description.en: Together with Huang Zicheng, advised the Jianwen Emperor to reduce the power of the princes to strengthen central authority.

description.zh-cn: 与齐泰共同向建文帝建议削藩，以加强中央集权。
description.en: Together with Qi Tai, advised the Jianwen Emperor to reduce the power of the princes to strengthen central authority.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝的削藩政策是靖难之役的直接导火索。
description.en: The Jianwen Emperor's policy of reducing the power of princes was the direct trigger for the Jingnan campaign.

description.zh-cn: 以“清君侧”为名，起兵发动“靖难之役”。
description.en: Under the pretext of 'clearing the court of evil ministers', he raised an army and launched the 'Jingnan campaign'.

description.zh-cn: 靖难之役导致建文帝政权被推翻，其本人在南京城破后失踪或自焚而死。
description.en: The Jingnan campaign led to the overthrow of the Jianwen Emperor's regime; he himself disappeared or died by self-immolation after the fall of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 打开南京金川门让燕军入城，直接帮助朱棣取得靖难之役的最终胜利。
description.en: Opened Nanjing's Jinchuan Gate to let the Yan army enter, directly helping Zhu Di achieve the final victory in the Jingnan campaign.

description.zh-cn: 率领水师战舰投降燕军，使朱棣的军队得以顺利渡过长江，攻克南京。
description.en: Led his naval fleet to surrender to the Yan army, enabling Zhu Di's forces to cross the Yangtze River smoothly and capture Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 曾劝说朱棣不要杀死方孝孺，称“城下之日，彼必不降，幸勿杀之。杀孝孺，天下读书种子绝矣。”
description.en: Advised Zhu Di not to kill Fang Xiaoru, saying, 'On the day the city falls, he will certainly not surrender. Please do not kill him. To kill Fang Xiaoru would be to extinguish the 'seeds of scholarship' in the world.'

description.zh-cn: 朱高炽是朱棣的长子。
description.en: Zhu Gaochi was the eldest son of Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 即位后下诏宽待建文朝诸臣家属，方孝孺的堂兄方孝复因此获得赦免。
description.en: After ascending the throne, he issued an edict to treat the families of Jianwen court officials with leniency, resulting in the pardon of Fang Xiaoru's cousin, Fang Xiaofu.

description.zh-cn: 南明弘光帝追赠方孝孺为太师，谥号“文正”。
description.en: The Hongguang Emperor of the Southern Ming posthumously honored Fang Xiaoru with the title of Grand Preceptor and the posthumous name 'Wenzheng'.
